items.sentence: Tom and Mary often go out for dinner together on Fridays.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to go to Boston with you?
Tom knew that he couldn\'t do what Mary wanted him to do.
I forgot to tell Tom to take the cookies out of the oven.
There\'s a good chance that Tom will be the next manager.
Tom told Mary not to tell anyone about what had happened.
Tom wanted a picture taken of the damage done to his car.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me I needed to do that.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me Mary had to do that.
Thanks for taking the time to answer all of my questions.
